message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,500. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $9,500 is a bit too high for me. Could you do any better?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8,200. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down, Alice. I'm getting closer to being able to make this work. Could you consider $7,500?
I'm not quite ready to give up on the price just yet, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $8,100. It's the best I can do. What do you think?
